plot: Mystery online film "The Influence" revolves around promises kept even though time has passed. To keep their values, characters are at a critical juncture to act upon their promises.
title: In-peul-loo-eon-seu
plot_es: Mystery online film "The Influence" revolves around promises kept even though time has passed. To keep their values, characters are at a critical juncture to act upon their promises.
plot_en: Mystery online film "The Influence" revolves around promises kept even though time has passed. To keep their values, characters are at a critical juncture to act upon their promises.
